channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Enough Senate Democrats vote with Republicans to break government shutdown impasse
item.description: The Senate passed a key test vote Sunday night on a plan that would reopen the government.

item.title: Senate advances funding measure, moving a step closer to ending shutdown
item.description: On Day 40 of the shutdown, eight Democrats joined Republicans in advancing a government funding measure, after 14 previous votes fell short.

item.title: 11/9: Sunday Morning
item.description: Hosted by Jane Pauley. Featured: Research in early-onset Alzheimer’s, “Landman” star Billy Bob Thornton, “Hamnet” actress Jessie Buckley, the psychic ...

item.title: Hall of Famer Lenny Wilkens, godfather of Seattle basketball, dies at 88
item.description: Wilkens brought his calm and savvy style as a point guard to the sideline.

item.title: Gov. Greg Abbott announces run for fourth term, touts property tax plan, economy
item.description: Gov. Greg Abbott announced on Sunday evening that he is running for a fourth term as governor of the Lone Star State.

item.title: 11/9/2025: The Family Farm; Collateral Damage; The Indomitable Margaret Atwood

item.title: Government shutdown updates: Senate vote marks step towards ending federal shutdown
item.description: Trump offers more insight into proposal that directs subsidies directly to the American people to pay for health care rather than sending funds insura...

item.title: Watch: Thune says he's hopeful government shutdown will end ahead of vote on key funding bill
item.description: Senate Majority Leader John Thune said he was "hopeful that we can finally bring the shutdown to an end" ahead of a vote to advance a key funding bill...

item.title: College students, stressed about federal food aid uncertainty, look to campuses for support
Mamdani's effect: Experts predict more millennial, Gen Z candidates will seek office
item.description: Zohran Mamdani's historic election win will likely not be the last time a candidate under 35 will win a major race, political experts said.

item.title: US airlines’ daily cancellations exceed 2,700 as shutdown impact extends
item.description: U.S. airlines canceled more than 2,700 flights Sunday mostly because of the government shutdown and the Federal Aviation Administration’s order to red...

item.title: Trump administration demands states ‘undo’ full SNAP payouts as states warn of ‘catastrophic impact’
WATCH: US consumer sentiment nears record lows amid government shutdown
item.description: ABC News' Elizabeth Schulze reports on weak financial data raising fresh concerns about the economy.
